description: The COVERAGE table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s encryption utility.

columns.name: COVERAGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value that indicates whether a coverage is managed care or indemnity; 1 � Indemnity, 2 � Managed Care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Indemnity


Managed Care

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column is only populated for indemnity coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 1). This column stores the unique identifier of the payor associated with the coverage record.  To look up the payor for managed care coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 2), join COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.COVERAGE_ID and filter on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.EFF_DATE and V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.TERM_DATE to find the relevant PAYOR_ID.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column is only populated for indemnity coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 1). This column stores the unique identifier of the benefit plan associated with the coverage record.  To look up the benefit plan for managed care coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 2), join COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.COVERAGE_ID and filter on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.EFF_DATE and V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.TERM_DATE to find the relevant BENEFIT_PLAN_ID.

columns.name: PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the employer group that determines the benefits in a managed care coverage. This item is NULL for indemnity coverages.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: COBRA_STATUS_YN
columns.description:
This yes/no flag is set to �Y� if the coverage has been extended beyond termination of the subscriber�s employment according to a COBRA arrangement. If the coverage has not been extended under such an arrangement, this value is �N� or null.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: COBRA_DATE
columns.description: The termination date for any COBRA arrangement.

columns.name: LATE_ENROLL_YN
columns.description:
Y if the subscriber applied for coverage outside of the open enrollment period. N or NULL if not specified as a late enrollment coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: STUDENT_REVIEW_DT
columns.description: The date on which you should review the status of any members on this coverage who are students.

columns.name: EPIC_CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage record. This column may be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of premium billing account associated with the coverage.

columns.name: CVG_EFF_DT
columns.description: The effective date of the coverage.

columns.name: CVG_TERM_DT
columns.description: The termination date of the coverage.

columns.name: CASEHEAD_NUMBER
columns.description: The Medicaid ID number on the case head.

columns.name: CASEHEAD_NAME
columns.description: The Medicaid name on the case head.

columns.name: TNSFRD_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage from which this coverage is transferred from.

columns.name: CVG_REG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verification status of the coverage, such as verified, changed, elapsed, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: VERIFY_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who performed the verification.

columns.name: GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the coverage group.

columns.name: CVG_ADDR1
columns.description: The first line of the address of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: CVG_ADDR2
columns.description: The second line of the address of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: CVG_CITY
columns.description: The city of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: CVG_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: CVG_PHONE1
columns.description: The primary phone number of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: GROUP_NUM
columns.description: The identification number assigned to this subscriber's employer/plan group by the payor.  This number will appear in box 11 of the HCFA claim form.

columns.name: CLAIM_MAIL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with where to send the claim on a coverage (i.e. send claim to payor, send claim to account, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payer


Account


Payer Plan


Coverage Address

columns.name: WC_EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: Workers' compensation employer at the time of injury.

columns.name: WC_EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: WC_DATE_OF_INJURY
columns.description: Workers Comp date of injury. This is the date the injury occurred on the job. This field is populated as the user sets up the WC account.

columns.name: IS_SIG_ON_FILE_YN
columns.description:
Appears in Box 12 of HCFA claims. This is a Yes/No field that denotes whether authorization has been obtained to send bill or other documentation to payor for services relating to the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ENROLL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This category value stores the enrollment reason of the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CVG_TERM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This category value stores the termination reason of the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REC_OF_SUBS_ID
columns.description: If the subscriber is the same person as a patient, this item contains the patient ID.

columns.name: ECD_TABLE_DEF_COPAY
columns.description: Numeric default copay value.

columns.name: COINSURANCE_OVR
columns.description: Numeric Value for the coverage level coinsurance override.

columns.name: MEDC_COVERED_LEFT
columns.description: This is the number of Medicare Covered Days Remaining

columns.name: MEDC_COINS_LEFT
columns.description: This is the number of Medicare Coinsurance Days Remaining

columns.name: MEDC_RESERVE_LEFT
columns.description: This is the number of Medicare Reserved Days Remaining

columns.name: CCS_PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient's Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) ID.

columns.name: CCS_DX
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis that makes the patient eligible for Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) coverage.

columns.name: CCS_CC_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) Case Coordinator.

columns.name: CCS_COOR_PHONE
columns.description: Stores the phone number for the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) Case Coordinator.

columns.name: CCS_COUNTY_PHONE
columns.description: Stores the phone number for the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) County Office.

columns.name: CVG_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CVG_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CVG_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).

columns.name: CVG_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EFF_HOSP_CVG_DT
columns.description: The effective date of Medicare Part A.

columns.name: EFF_PROV_CVG_DT
columns.description: The effective date of Medicare Part B.

columns.name: MEDICARE_CVG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the type of Medicare coverage the patient has.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Part A


Part B


Parts A & B

columns.name: Q4CO_BUCKETS_EXC_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate if bucket limits exceeded during carryover


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MED_SEC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Medicare Secondary Insurance Type Code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Working Aged Beneficiary or Spouse with EGHP


ESRD Beneficiary in the Mandated Coordination Period with an EGHP


No-fault Insurance Including Auto is Primary


Worker's Compensation


Public Health Service (PHS) or Other Federal Agency


Black Lung


Veteran's Administration


Disabled Beneficiary Under Age 65 with Large Group Health Plan (LGHP)


Other Liability Insurance is Primary

columns.name: CHDP_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Child Health and Disability Prevention County Code.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CVG_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: CHDP_AID_CODE
columns.description: The Child Health and Disability Prevention Aid Code.

columns.name: CVG_CARD_ISSUE_DT
columns.description: Stores the card issue date.

columns.name: CVG_DEDUCTIBLE_YN
columns.description:
This item will serve as a flag to let the end user know if the response has any deductible information


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: FIRST_SPEC_AID_CODE
columns.description: First special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.

columns.name: SEC_SPEC_AID_CODE
columns.description: Second special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.

columns.name: THRD_SPEC_AID_CODE
columns.description: Third special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.

columns.name: EVC_NUM
columns.description: Eligibility Verification Confirmation (EVC) that is used on the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.

columns.name: COUNTY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item will store the county code that is returned from the 271 message.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: EXT_ROUTING_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The external routing number for the coverage


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SUBSCR_OR_SELF_MEM_PAT_ID
columns.description: This item contains the subscriber patient Id of a coverage and will be used to associate patients with linked premium billing accounts for EHI.
